General Information
Phone: (904) 446-2899
Ready to Reserve your Spot?
Book Now

Group Golf Events
Have your golf tournament professionally hosted at one of the most unique Golf Clubs in the Jacksonville area – Blue Sky Golf Club! Formerly known as Mill Cove, Blue Sky Golf Club has been transformed into the great public Golf Course it was always meant to be.
In addition to golf on our Arnold Palmer Signature Golf Course, the Club will provide your tournament with professional scoring, tournament announcements, on-course contests (i.e. closest to the pin, longest drive), range balls and a fantastic tournament experience!
Whether you’re planning for 20 or 200, you’ll find everything you need to host the perfect golf tournament at Blue Sky Golf Club. The venue, the friendly Team, the details — everything is taken care of so you get to focus on enjoying your event and interacting with your Guests.
Host A Tournament
A Gorgeous Setting for Your Event
Your tournament will be showcased against the beautiful backdrop of our recently updated Arnold Palmer Signature Design Course. You’ll love what we’ve done during the $1.5 million renovation!
For many of your tournament attendees, it may be the first time they’ve seen the new Blue Sky Golf Course, formerly known as Mill Cove. Add an extra layer of excitement to your tournament and be the first to host an event at this unique and beautiful Golf Club right in the Jacksonville area.
Help With Planning Your Golf Event
Hosting a golf tournament is made easy with our talented Team. We’ll work with you to plan and organize your event, and when tournament day arrives, we’ll be there right by your side to make sure everything goes off without a hitch.
Your custom golf event will be carefully orchestrated around your goals, your style, and your budget. From charity golf tournaments to corporate outings or even family events that call for a special venue, we’ve got a world-class Team to help you pull it off.
A Fantastic Tournament Experience
Our fabulous Golf Course and expert Team are only the beginning. Together, we’ll put together an experience your guests won’t soon forget. They’ll appreciate the “extras” we can add to their day:
On-course contests like closest-to-the-pin or longest drive
Range balls
Tournament announcements
Professional scoring
Your Guests will also love the Blue Sky Golf Club Bar & Grill, which boasts a friendly, casual atmosphere where everyone can relax and have a good time. The design is modern and fresh and we’re incredibly proud of the wonderful Team that makes this unique space a favorite gathering spot for Members and their Guests.
Ready to host your fundraising event, corporate outing, or family get-together at Blue Sky? Give us a call at (904) 446-2899 or email
This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it.
.

Book Now

Flexibility, Convenience, and a Stunning Backdrop for Your Social Event
When you’re hosting an event, you want everything to be easy, fun, and memorable. Our Event Team can take care of all the planning for you, ensuring you’ll feel relaxed and excited the day of your big event.
We do any type of event:
Weddings
Holiday parties
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Anniversaries
Bridal showers
Baby Showers
Sweet 16 Parties
Golf tournaments
And more
CATERING MENU
